videoSnippet.title: Thats' How You Play in Riga! || Šarić vs Shirov || Grand Swiss (2021)
videoSnippet.description:

Photos by Lennart Ootes! (mostly)

Saric, Ivan (2644) - Shirov, Alexei (2659) 0-1
FIDE Chess.com Grand Swiss (chess24.com) [5] 2021.10.31
C78 Ruy Lopez, 5.O-O

1.e4 e5 2.Nf3 Nc6 3.Bb5 a6 4.Ba4 Nf6 5.O-O b5 6.Bb3 Bc5 7.c3 d6 8.a4 Rb8 9.d4 Bb6 10.a5 Ba7 11.h3 Bb7 12.Be3 Nxe4 13.Re1 exd4 14.cxd4 d5 15.Nbd2 Ne7 16.Nxe4 dxe4 17.Ne5 O-O 18.Qg4 Bd5 19.Bxd5 Qxd5 20.Rac1 c5 21.dxc5 Qxe5 22.Bf4 Qxb2 23.Qd7 Ng6 24.Bd6 e3 25.Rf1 exf2+ 26.Kh1 Rbe8 27.Rcd1 Bb8 28.Bxf8 Kxf8 29.g3 Bxg3 30.c6 Qc2

00:00 Hello Everyone!
00:46 Game Starts!
01:29 Game Really Starts!
04:00 Completely New Game!
08:30 Pause The Video!
12:20 It Was In This Position
14:28 Contributions
